summary: This bill, the Election Worker Protection Act of 2025, aims to enhance the safety and security of election workers. It provides grants to states for recruitment, training, and safety measures; directs the Attorney General to provide training and resources regarding threats to election workers; authorizes grants to protect election workers' personally identifiable information; makes the harassment of election workers a federal crime; amends existing laws to prevent interference with tabulation and certification efforts and the doxxing of election workers; and allows for the removal of disruptive poll observers.
